titles: Gods love and mans unworthiness whereunto is annexed a discourse between the soul & Satan : with several divine ejaculations / written by John Quarles.
author: Quarles, John, 1624-1665.
publisher: Printed for John Stafford, and are to be sold at his house ... and by Humphrey Moseley ... and John Holden ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
